data.prayer: Father, let those from the 40,501 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Budaun, Uttar Pradesh, India

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Budaun, Uttar Pradesh, India will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Budaun, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Please, teach the 40,501 believers in Budaun, Uttar Pradesh, India how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Budaun, Uttar Pradesh, India into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Kachhi Kachhwaha people.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of Budaun to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Budaun access to a Bible in their own language.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Budaun, Uttar Pradesh, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Budaun
location.people_groups_list: Rajput Jadon, Bania Mathur, Jat Sarawat, Bania Palliwal, Kahar (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Rajput Jadon (587,000), Bania Mathur (35,000), Jat Sarawat (30,000), Bania Palliwal (20,000), Kahar (Muslim traditions) (83,000)
